resources.string: I am the oldest of 5 siblings. Three of my siblings are adopted.
Some of my favorite places to eat include chilis, and virgs. I love getting chicken and basically anything made from potatoes.
My name is Easton Madsen. I am 17 years old. I love to play civilization 5, and hearthstone.
I love playing video games. Its what I do in my spare time. Right now I am really into hearthstone.
I love the books by Brandon Sanderson, especially the Mistborn series. I also love Percy Jackson books by Rick Riordan. As you can see I am into fantasy books.
